column1: Which of the following is a reason that geneticists use mitochondrial DNA (mtDNA) to study the relatedness of animal populations?

column3: population levels of a species are kept at equilibrium through natural regulatory mechanisms
column4: a given prey organism is subject to higher predation rates by more diverse predators
column5: a given prey organism is less likely to undergo a population surge
